description:
Hustle Con 2014 is happening on August 1st in San Francisco!

Click here to see who's speaking!

When you take this course, you will walk away with startup tactics/skills that you can apply to your venture right now.


Hustle Con is different from other startup conferences you might attend. Weâ€™re not going to talk about the abstract wonders of entrepreneurship. Rather, our sessions are organized around tactical advice on prototyping, acquiring customers, and setting up your tech startup.

Our speakers are successful non-technical entrepreneurs who founded companies including Intuit, Polyvore, Badgeville, Udemy, ReTargeter, and many more.
title: Hustle Con - Learn Tactics for Starting/Scaling a Startup
